page.title: 13FARMING IN GORDON
page.content: In our area of study the farming is mainly a mixture of growing crops and raising animals.In Gordon alone there are 2 farms called Gordon Cottage owned by Mr Browne and West Mains owned by Mr Bell.Also in our rectangle there are 7 other farms.Mr Browne finds farming hard work because he is getting old.He's always wanted to be a farmer because he thinks it's a job that you can be your own master.The livestock is 80 cows and their calves.It is about 50 hours a week he works and roughly 7 hours in a day, apart from the silage,hay and potato seasons.2 people are employed by Mr Browne and he finds them very helpful.The worst thing that has ever happened to him was when he drove the pick-up into the tractor and left a big dent in the pick-up.
